channel.title: Noobscape - Port Changed/Opened connections not aviable
channel.description:
As topic subject sas,
I've changed port to 43595 ( as i run more servers ) Compiled Opened port 43595
Settings.ini ( in client... )
But outsider connections cannot connect to this server.

item.title: Noobscape - Port Changed/Opened connections not aviable
item.dc:creator: @EndlessLife EndlessLife
item.description:
@EndlessLife wrote:

bengina:

Have you changed the port in your server class and set the ip to your internal ip?

Internal as 192.168.x.x For example?

EDIT : worked.

Read full topic
item.source: Noobscape - Port Changed/Opened connections not aviable

item.title: Noobscape - Port Changed/Opened connections not aviable
item.dc:creator: @EndlessLife EndlessLife
item.description:
@EndlessLife wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:2, topic:370945”]Have you opened the port via your router?
If so download no-ip and set up with the portnumber and your external ip.

Hope this helps!

:D[/quote]

I have 4 diffrent servers running without problems, using my payed webdomain IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape - Port Changed/Opened connections not aviable
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Have you opened the port via your router?
If so download no-ip and set up with the portnumber and your external ip.

Hope this helps!
